name: ShadowboxVR
description:
Shadowbox VR is a boxing game where your main goal is to punch the incoming objects to the rhythm of the music.

Highly inspired by shadow boxing routines, the levels & songs found throughout the game will make you improve your agility, footwork, reflexes and eye-hand coordination.

With different levels of intensity, diverse scenarios and themes, you have the freedom to customize your own experience.

From hitting boxing pears to dodging satellites on space, make your experience fun!

This right here is a demo, the final release will be available at Steam. In this demo you will be able to play one of the songs we have available in the game!
